h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Crafting Materials Locations
content: This guide and our walkthrough goes ever each Crafting Material, its location in the game, and its quality - which determines what equipment it upgrades. Some of the Treasures you find can be sold directly to vendors from a profit. Clicking on the links will take you to more detailed breakdowns of where to find each material, alongside the exact locations of the rarer ones.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Crafting_Materials.md', within the main section titled 'Crafting Materials', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Crafting Materials Locations'.
The content is as follows:
This guide and our walkthrough goes ever each Crafting Material, its location in the game, and its quality - which determines what equipment it upgrades. Some of the Treasures you find can be sold directly to vendors from a profit. Clicking on the links will take you to more detailed breakdowns of where to find each material, alongside the exact locations of the rarer ones.
